EXPERIENCE

Researched competing titles, while also working with proofreading and writing cover and catalog copy, as well as manuscript styling. Helped with office tasks to assist with organizational needs (filing, keeping track of sales, sending out mailings, and composing letters).

  • Member and Social Media Consultant (Fall 2011- 2012)

    • Worked with Beautiful Social, a non-profit consulting agency made up of students with a focus on social media and change. Designed social media strategies for clients and social entrepreneurs.

CONFERENCES & PRESENTATIONS

  • Celebration of Student Achievement
  • Saint Joseph's University (2013)

    • Created a replication of Showtime's television show Dexter. Discussed the process of the project, which included: close detail and editing, attention to aesthetics, and extensive group collaboration.


  • Conference on Peer Tutoring in Writing (NCPTW)
  • "The Year of the Writer" Tampa, FL (2013)

    • This panel presentation focused on the new digital writer, discussing things such as blogging strategies and aesthetics, while also reviewing approaches for offering digital consultations in writing centers. Various models were offered to the audience for implementing digital resources into writing centers. All research illustrated the growing need for digital tutoring, and the challenges and rewards that come along with it. The transformative impact that technology is having on the concept of a traditional writing center, and writers alike, is a topic that deserves further discussion as we delve further into the information age.
